abstract: Paetec Holding said Monday that it would buy the privately held McLeodUSA, which manages high-capacity fiber networks, for $492 million in stock, to compete with Verizon and AT&T in the business market for phone and data service.
lead_paragraph: Paetec Holding said Monday that it would buy the privately held McLeodUSA, which manages high-capacity fiber networks, for $492 million in stock, to compete with Verizon and AT&T in the business market for phone and data service.
